biotools.summary: IRMa ( Interprétation des Résultats Mascot)  toolbox provides an interactive application to assist in the validation of Mascot® search results. IRMa reads MASCOT® result (using Matrix Science® Parser distributed free of charge) and automatically filters identified peptides. All relevant information is displayed in a structured manner, showing “proteins hits” details. User can then manually or automatically confirm or reject individual peptide spectrum matches.
